tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Create project network
actions.description:
Creates a project network.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

actions.name: List project networks
actions.description:
Lists project networks.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Show project network information
actions.description:
Shows information for a specified
 project network.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

actions.name: Delete project network
actions.description:
Deletes a specified project network.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.
